TopicTitle: Sunday Snacks (Kerbal Cookie Program II) Bacon and Eggs

Articles.Content:
Remember Kerbal Cookie Program? Well, people asked me to do more stupid stuff, so I did. Here it is.

Bacon and Eggs

I have for you today a skillet mounted over an Eco Friendly Turbo Cook Camping Oven Mk II, with two slices of bacon and a fried egg in it.

I feel incredibly stupid right now, but I was asked to do this...

Let's get this cookout started! Fire up the Camping Oven!

Mmm, look at that sizzle! Smells like kerosene, that must mean we got the temperature right.

I guess this giant snack showcase is going to become a weekly thing for me, so if you have a specific food you want to see built as a craft, PM me or leave a reply below. Like the Cookies, I won't post a DL unless someone asks for it. Let me know what you think of this... thing..., and be sure to leave some rep if you enjoyed!

Enjoy your Sunday, it only comes once a week.

Edited August 16, 2015 by pTrevTrevs
